text.div:
This case-sensitive code system http://hl7.org/fhir/measure-definition-example defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
screening ScreeningCompletion of a clinical or diagnostic tool used to identify people at risk of developing or having a certain disease or condition, even in the absence of symptoms.
standardized-depression-screening-tool Standardized Depression Screening ToolA normalized and validated depression screening tool developed for the patient population in which it is being utilized.

name: MeasureDefinitionExample
title: Measure Definition Example
description: Example Measure Definitions for the Measure Resource.

concept.definition: Completion of a clinical or diagnostic tool used to identify people at risk of developing or having a certain disease or condition, even in the absence of symptoms.
A normalized and validated depression screening tool developed for the patient population in which it is being utilized.
